AboutMe

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is Sonali Sharma.I am a B.tech Computer Science Undergraduate in 3rd year,pursuing my B.tech(Hons) degree with specialization in Data Analytics from Galgotias University,Greater Noida. The major subjects that I have studied till now are Data Structures and Algorithms,Design and Analysis of Algorithms,Data Mining and Warehousing,Introduction to Big Data. I have worked on many small projects in my following years of engineering and also participated in many hackathons namely NASASpaceApp Challenge-2019,Dexterix 1.0 and 2.0,Hackerflow 2.O(Chandigarh University),Odessa Campus Hiring Hackathon.This emphasizes that I am having a pretty well experience of working in a team and reaching to a point of solution in a fixed time-frame in various hackathons.Along with this,I am able to identify one of my strengths that I am a quick learner and "can learn by doing/working" and also adaptable to changing environments.

Codules Technologies Pvt Ltd

Java Developer Intern

In the summer of 2019,I worked as a Java Developer Intern(Summer Intern) at Codules Technologies Pvt. Ltd. First of all,I have received the training of Core Java Concepts(like class,object,entity,relationship,constrcutor, destructor,variables,function,constant variable) and most importantly OOPS concepts(Data Abstraction,Data Encapsulation,Polymorphism, Inheritance,Interfaces,Abstract Classes and Methods) and Advanced Java(Servelts introduction,JSP,Remote Method Invocation, Enterprise Java Beans,Spring Framework 4.0).After doing the training provided by the company instructors,I started working on intern projects that are required by clients because it is a service based company.I have developed 3 projects in the internship period. The three projects are titled as "Smart Hostel Management System","Hospital Management System","People Talk" based on Core Java and Advanced Java functionalities.

Freenlancing Work

IoT Project

In the month of November 2019,I participated in one of the hackathons conducted in my college named as Dexterix 2.0.Th themes included in the hackathon are Agriculture,healthcare,tranportration,AI/ML,Drones. I have partcipated in the category of agriculture and have the team in "girls" category.We have made a smart(AI-enabled) agriculture system with soil moisture sensor,rain water sensor,humidity sensor connected through arduino board and motor.Our project was well designed and developed and we won the first prize in the category of "girls team".

GirlScript Foundation

Winter Mentorship Program 3.0

GirlScript Foundation is an non-profit organization started with a motive of teaching the students with the best possible tecnologies. It spreads awareness about the new trends in technologies in the field of Data Strcutues and Algorithms,Artificial Intellidence,Machine Learning,Web Development,Andriod Development,UI/UX developer,Product design.In the following series,they launched a winter Mentorship program from the year 2017 and I got selected in the year 2019(version 3.0) in the web development category.After getting selected,I was given the course and content materials to brush up my web development skills and to add on to my knowledge bucket, after which,I was assigned a project that I have complete within 1 month and it get evaluated.I received the participation certficate Andriod got incentives for the same.It was a wonderful experience.
